Name: PROTESTER
Text: Eh, hi! I was in the forest yesterday where Wood Cut Group was logging.

Name: PROTESTER
Text: I got your address from the employment agency.

Name: PROTESTER
Text: That remote saw of yours really hurt some of my friends!

Name: PROTESTER
Text: I have a proposition for you. Install this addon onto your phone.

Name: PROTESTER
Text: It gives you a new tool, you can protect the trees with it! Try it out today, please.
